trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for arguments for events dealing with a change in input language.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una classe base per gli argomenti per gli eventi correlati a una modifica della lingua di input.

trans-unit.source: This class provides the base for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> classes, which in turn provide arguments for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> routed events, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe fornisce la base per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs>classi, che a sua volta, specificare gli argomenti per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging>eventi indirizzati, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes base class values for a new instance of a deriving class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza valori della classe base per una nuova istanza della classe di derivazione.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs> should call this constructor to ensure that values provided by the abstract base class are initialized properly.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che derivano da <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs>devono chiamare questo costruttore per assicurare che i valori forniti dalla classe di base astratta vengono inizializzati correttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The constructors for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> automatically call this base constructor.
trans-unit.target: I costruttori per <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs>automaticamente chiamare questo costruttore di base.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing a new current input language.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto che rappresenta la nuova lingua di input corrente.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>che rappresenta la lingua di input corrente precedente.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new current input language.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto che rappresenta la nuova lingua di input corrente.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is established through the `newLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di questa proprietà viene stabilito tramite la `newLanguageId` fornito dal parametro di <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new current input language.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto che rappresenta la nuova lingua di input corrente.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>che rappresenta la lingua di input corrente precedente.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is established through the `previousLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di questa proprietà viene stabilito tramite la `previousLanguageId` fornito dal parametro di <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>che rappresenta la lingua di input corrente precedente.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>
